name: Just Crates
description:
Sokoban style, crate pushing game in puzzle script

There are 10 levels. The goal of each level is to cover all targets with all crates. You can push one crate at a time - crates cannot push other crates. These are essentially 10 sokoban levels, of varying levels of difficulty, created by me!

Please feel free to leave a comment! This is a part of a personal challenge to make a simple puzzle game every day for a week, with at least 10 levels. I'm using puzzlescript for each game. This is game five.
